title: fourth_chapter_start
body:
Mace, You got news?
Niar won't cooperate
They prefer it alone
Then we are all doomed
But there is another way to get Niar with us again
If we overthrow Mayor we might have a chance
What?!
That is the only way
No I won't agree to these nonsense
There must be another way
Do you have any idea?
You must resolve your differences
I can't see it happening
For now however we have a problem
What do you mean?
Mayor told me of a war coming to us
Of hoards of undead
He told you when
No
I will send scouts.
Thank you.
Help if you can with the undead in this region and take that
[[stop]]

title: maga
body:
The undead are not far off
We must get Mayor on our side
But how?
He may lost his faith on me but not on you
Connect with him
[[stop]]

title: not_happening
body:
Mace, I'm sorry, you have not heard the full story
Me and Keevan have some history
He betrayed me
1 year ago he sent mercenaries to infiltrate the town and kill me
My troops found out about the mercenaries and delayed their plans
In the next two days were 3 assassination attemps
With no succession
And at the last night we got them
They told us Keevan was the one responsible
He denied the truth to reserve the alliance
But I never believed him.
Not on that day and not since.
Mace, we need you
What do you say?
[[I will join you|join_mayor]][[Keevan has the right mind|join_keevan]]

title: join_mayor
body:
Great
This is the beginning of great times
Come by tomorrow
We have work to do
[[stop]]

title: join_keevan
body:
Disappointing
You fail to see the truth
Did he sent you here to spy on me?
Go tell him everything bad you found on me
[[stop]]
